alert.note: Alert for Orange (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 17 at 6:38PM EDT until October 17 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ORANGE...SOUTHERN GRANVILLE...NORTH CENTRAL WAKE... DURHAM AND WEST CENTRAL FRANKLIN COUNTIES... At 638 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Durham, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Durham, Chapel Hill, Creedmoor, Butner, Stem, Lake Michie, Falls Lake State Rec Area, Eno River State Park, Parkwood and Gorman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
